[[File:Bag_Electric_Egg_Sprite.png|thumb|120px|Electric Egg]] An '''Electric Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Electric-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos |- | Magnemite || | Chinchou || Electrike || Pachirisu || Blitzle || |- | Pikachu || | Mareep || Plusle || Shinx || || |- | Voltorb || | Elekid || Minun || || || |- | Electabuzz || | || | || || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Vermillion City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Olivine City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Mauville City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Sunyshore City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Nimbasa City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Lumiose City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
